description:
-Go to https://www.demoblaze.com/
-Sign Up as a new user
-Validate if you try signup with same user modal will appear
-Log in
-Log out
-Try logging in with invalid user

steps.name: Assert that 'Sign Up Button' is displayed
Check that 'Sign Up Button' is displayed
Check that 'Sign Up Button' is disabled
Check that 'Sign Up Button' is disabled
Assert equals (expected: Sign up successful., actual: Sign up successful.)
